channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 06:04 Countering the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 06:04 Countering the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukranian Air Monitoring System, and may indicate a potential or immiment air-based attack or other threat.
